name: h3
description: The 2026 Marucci CATX RCKLESS Composite Drop 13 USA Tee Ball Bat is designed to elevate your young athlete's game with precision and style. Featuring a balanced swing feel, this one-piece composite bat is USA Baseball certified, ensuring top-notch performance on the field. Its 2 5/8 inch barrel diameter, complemented by a ring-free barrel construction, enhances barrel flex and overall production, making every hit count. The custom knob design, tailored for each drop, provides a superior feel, while the enhanced soft-touch grip ensures maximum control. Finished in a striking black, teal, and purple colorway, this bat combines aesthetics with functionality for the perfect tee-ball experience. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
